meanings.definition: ウキガイ科：翼足類（有殻翼足類）の科の一つ。
meanings.english_definition: A family of pelagic sea snails in the order Thecosomata (shelled pteropods).

examples.translation: ウキガイ科は小型の浮遊性巻貝です。

etymology.value: Limacina + -idae (動物の科を示す接尾辞)

related_words.hierarchy: Mollusca (門) > Gastropoda (綱) > Heterobranchia (亜綱) > Thecosomata (目) > Limacinidae (科)
